/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique architectural style and color. A large white building with a curved facade stands out prominently, its modern design contrasting with the traditional structures that flank it. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the cityscape.
